statements: DELETE FROM transactions WHERE source_wallet = 'wallet_A' AND amount = 500.00 AND status = 'complete';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE status = 'pending' AND currency = 'USD';
DELETE FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 500 AND amount = 100.50;
DELETE FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND user_id = 123;
DELETE FROM payment_audit_logs WHERE audit_action = 'Refund' AND audit_date < '2021-08-01';
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 1001 AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE currency = 'USD' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND currency = 'USD';
DELETE FROM wallets WHERE balance < -500 OR user_id = 10;
